ygData.subject: Re: Ore Close to Feydark
ygData.msgSnippet: There is a forge in Kelethin.  I forget exactly where, but I ve personally seen it, so I m sure it is there.  I didn t find a place to buy ore there, but I
ygData.messageBody:
There is a forge in Kelethin. I forget exactly where, but I've personally seen it, so I'm sure it is there. I didn't find a place to buy ore there, but I didn't check every shop and vendor, so I might have missed it. Don't know about Steamfont or BB.


> from: fkrueger@...
>
> Is there a place to buy ore in Steamfont (or is it Steamfront?) or Butcherblock? I'm a level 8 Ranger Wood-Elf (a LONE ranger) interested in smithing. Are either of these zones relatively safe for me? One more question as long as I'm here, is there a forge in Kelethin? Thanks in advance.
>
